scripts.watch: (cd packages && for pkg in *; do if [[ -d "$pkg" ]]; then npm run watch --workspace="$pkg" --if-present & fi done); wait
scripts.build: set -e; for pkg in hash utils errors schema schema-diagram functions client react db server s3 hub type-gen cli; do npm run build -w "@based/$pkg"; done
scripts.build-release-debug: npm run build-podman && npm run build-locale && (cd packages/crc32c && npm run build-release) && (cd packages/schema && npm run build-release) && (cd packages/db && npm run build-release-debug)
scripts.build-release: npm run build-podman && npm run build-locale && (cd packages/crc32c && npm run build-release) && (cd packages/schema && npm run build-release) && (cd packages/db && npm run build-release)
